publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6670 Andrew Welsh on behalf of the Finance Committee: 4th Report, 2010 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on the Budget Strategy Phase—That the Parliament notes the 4th Report, 2010 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on the Budget Strategy Phase (SP Paper 455) and refers the report and its recommendations to the Scottish Government for consideration. Supported by: Tom McCabe* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-6670 Andrew Welsh on behalf of the Finance Committee: 4th Report, 2010 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on the Budget Strategy Phase—That the Parliament notes the 4th Report, 2010 (Session 3) of the Finance Committee on the Budget Strategy Phase (SP Paper 455) and refers the report and its recommendations to the Scottish Government for consideration.
